title: Backend: Implement Core Jint Engine Wrapper Service
description: Create an `ITransformationEngine` interface and a `JintTransformationEngine` implementation to encapsulate all Jint-specific logic for script execution.
sprint_goal: Establish the foundational secure transformation engine and the data model for script management.
acceptance_criteria: Service is injectable; basic ES6 script executes correctly; handles JsonNode input/output.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit tests passing with 90% coverage; Integration with DI container verified.
testing_requirements: Unit tests covering successful execution and basic error handling.
deployment_notes: Core component for all other backend tasks.
business_value: Provides the foundational script execution capability.

title: Backend: Configure Jint Sandbox Constraints
description: Enhance the `JintTransformationEngine` to run scripts within a secure sandbox, disabling CLR access and setting limits for timeout, memory, and statement count.
sprint_goal: Establish the foundational secure transformation engine and the data model for script management.
acceptance_criteria: CLR access is blocked; Infinite loops are terminated; Memory limits are enforced; Constraints are configurable.
definition_of_done: Security code review passed; Unit tests for each constraint violation implemented; Configuration loaded from appsettings.json.
testing_requirements: Unit tests for each constraint violation scenario (timeout, memory, CLR).
deployment_notes: Critical security feature. Must be thoroughly tested.
business_value: Protects the system from resource exhaustion and malicious scripts.

title: DB: Implement EF Core Models for Scripts and Versions
description: Define `TransformationScript` and `TransformationScriptVersion` entities using EF Core with a one-to-many relationship.
sprint_goal: Establish the foundational secure transformation engine and the data model for script management.
epic: Control Panel UI and API for Script Management
acceptance_criteria: EF Core migration is generated successfully; Schema is created correctly after migration.
definition_of_done: Database migration file created and tested; Code reviewed.
testing_requirements: Successful database migration on a test database.
deployment_notes: Prerequisite for all API development for script management.
business_value: Provides the data persistence layer for transformation scripts.

title: Backend: Implement Encryption at Rest for Scripts
description: Implement an EF Core `ValueConverter` using .NET Data Protection APIs to transparently encrypt script content in the database.
sprint_goal: Establish the foundational secure transformation engine and the data model for script management.
acceptance_criteria: Script content is not in plaintext in the DB; Application can save and retrieve scripts transparently; Data protection keys persist service restarts.
definition_of_done: Integration test verifies end-to-end encryption/decryption; Key management strategy is documented and reviewed.
testing_requirements: Integration test to verify encryption/decryption cycle; Manual database inspection.
deployment_notes: Requires careful management of DPAPI key ring in production.
business_value: Protects intellectual property and sensitive business logic in scripts.

title: Backend: Enforce RBAC on All Script Management Endpoints
description: Apply the `[Authorize(Roles = "Administrator")]` attribute to all API controllers related to script management.
sprint_goal: Establish the foundational secure transformation engine and the data model for script management.
acceptance_criteria: Non-admin requests return 403; Admin requests succeed; Unauthenticated requests return 401.
definition_of_done: Integration tests with mock users in different roles are passing.
testing_requirements: Integration tests with mock users in 'Administrator' and non-admin roles.
deployment_notes: To be applied as API endpoints are developed.
business_value: Enforces the principle of least privilege for a sensitive configuration area.

title: Backend: Implement Global Exception Handler for Engine Isolation
description: Create a mechanism to ensure that any catastrophic, unhandled exception within the Jint engine is caught without crashing the main application service.
sprint_goal: Establish the foundational secure transformation engine and the data model for script management.
acceptance_criteria: Jint crash does not crash the service; The specific job is marked 'Failed'; A detailed error is logged.
definition_of_done: Integration test simulating a Jint crash passes; Code reviewed.
testing_requirements: Integration test that proves the main service remains responsive after a simulated Jint crash.
deployment_notes: Enhances system stability against poorly written user scripts.
business_value: Improves overall system reliability and fault tolerance.

title: Backend: Implement Script CRUD API Endpoints
description: Create a `TransformationsController` with RESTful endpoints for Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on `TransformationScript` entities.
sprint_goal: Deliver the complete CRUD interface for creating, editing, and managing transformation scripts.
epic: Control Panel UI and API for Script Management
acceptance_criteria: CRUD endpoints (POST, GET, PUT, DELETE) are functional; Update operation creates a new version; RBAC is enforced.
definition_of_done: All endpoints are covered by integration tests; OpenAPI/Swagger documentation is generated and accurate.
collaboration_required: Frontend team to define API contract.
testing_requirements: Integration tests for all CRUD endpoints, including validation and authorization.
deployment_notes: Blocks all frontend development for script management.
business_value: Provides the API layer for all script management UI features.

title: Frontend: Implement Script List and Create/Edit Views
description: Develop the React components for the main 'Transformations' page, which lists existing scripts and provides actions to create, edit, and delete.
sprint_goal: Deliver the complete CRUD interface for creating, editing, and managing transformation scripts.
epic: Control Panel UI and API for Script Management
acceptance_criteria: UI displays table of scripts; Create button navigates to edit form; Edit and Delete actions call respective APIs.
definition_of_done: Component tests are passing; E2E tests for CRUD operations are passing; UI is responsive and accessible.
testing_requirements: Component tests; E2E tests for CRUD workflow.
deployment_notes: Can be developed against a mock API once the contract is defined.
business_value: Provides the user-facing interface for managing transformation scripts.

title: Frontend: Integrate Monaco Editor for Script Editing
description: Embed and configure the Monaco Editor component within the script edit page, enabling syntax highlighting, code completion, and real-time validation.
sprint_goal: Deliver the complete CRUD interface for creating, editing, and managing transformation scripts.
epic: Control Panel UI and API for Script Management
acceptance_criteria: Monaco editor is rendered; Syntax is highlighted; Syntax errors are shown with red squiggles; Save button is disabled on syntax error.
definition_of_done: Editor features are manually verified; Bundle size impact is analyzed and accepted; Dynamic import is used for performance.
testing_requirements: Manual E2E testing of the editor features; Performance testing of page load time.
deployment_notes: May require build tool configuration for lazy loading.
business_value: Provides a professional, rich editing experience for administrators.

title: Backend: Implement Structured Error Handling for Script Exceptions
description: Catch `Jint.Runtime.JavaScriptException`, extract details, and return a structured 400 Bad Request response from API controllers.
sprint_goal: Deliver the complete CRUD interface for creating, editing, and managing transformation scripts.
acceptance_criteria: Script errors are caught and do not crash the service; Preview API returns HTTP 400 with structured JSON error.
definition_of_done: Unit tests verify exception mapping; Integration test verifies the HTTP 400 response format.
collaboration_required: Frontend team to consume the error DTO.
testing_requirements: Unit and integration tests verifying the HTTP 400 response format.
business_value: Provides clear, actionable feedback for script authors, improving the debugging experience.

title: Backend: Implement Script Preview API Endpoint
description: Implement `POST /api/v1/transformations/preview` to accept a script and either sample data or a connector ID, enforcing a 30-second timeout.
sprint_goal: Implement the interactive script preview feature and the comprehensive audit trail.
epic: Control Panel UI and API for Script Management
acceptance_criteria: Endpoint returns transformed data for both sample and live data requests; Long-running scripts are terminated with a timeout error.
definition_of_done: Integration tests cover all success and failure scenarios, including timeout enforcement.
testing_requirements: Integration tests for all scenarios.
deployment_notes: Blocks the frontend preview UI implementation.
business_value: Enables rapid, interactive development and debugging of transformation scripts.

title: Frontend: Implement 3-Pane Resizable Preview UI
description: On the `ScriptEditPage`, implement a layout with three resizable panes for the script editor, sample JSON input, and output/error view.
sprint_goal: Implement the interactive script preview feature and the comprehensive audit trail.
epic: Control Panel UI and API for Script Management
acceptance_criteria: UI displays three resizable panes; Layout is responsive; Panel state is persisted in local storage.
definition_of_done: Layout is manually verified; Component tests pass.
testing_requirements: Manual E2E testing and code review.
business_value: Provides a flexible and professional user experience for script development.

title: Frontend: Integrate Preview API and State Management
description: Implement the frontend logic to call the `preview` API endpoint and manage UI state for loading, success, and error conditions.
sprint_goal: Implement the interactive script preview feature and the comprehensive audit trail.
epic: Control Panel UI and API for Script Management
acceptance_criteria: UI shows loading state; Success displays formatted JSON; Errors display structured error messages.
definition_of_done: Component tests for UI states are passing; E2E workflow is verified.
testing_requirements: Component tests and E2E testing of the full preview workflow.
business_value: Connects the user interface with the backend execution engine, completing the preview feature.

title: Analysis: Design Audit Log and Security Violation Schemas for MongoDB
description: Define the BSON document schemas for the `AuditLog` and `SecurityViolationLog` collections in MongoDB.
sprint_goal: Implement the interactive script preview feature and the comprehensive audit trail.
acceptance_criteria: Schemas are documented and reviewed for compliance with SOC 2/ISO 27001 objectives.
definition_of_done: Design document is reviewed and approved by the tech lead and compliance stakeholders.
testing_requirements: Design review.
deployment_notes: Prerequisite for all audit log implementation.
business_value: Ensures the audit logging feature will meet its compliance goals.

title: Backend: Implement Audit Trail for Script CRUD and Associations
description: Use MediatR to publish domain events from CQRS handlers, with asynchronous event handlers that write audit logs to MongoDB.
sprint_goal: Implement the interactive script preview feature and the comprehensive audit trail.
acceptance_criteria: CRUD operations on scripts write entries to the AuditLog collection; The operation is decoupled and asynchronous.
definition_of_done: Integration tests verify that domain events trigger the creation of audit log documents.
testing_requirements: Integration tests.
business_value: Provides a compliant audit trail for all configuration changes.

title: Backend: Implement Version History and Revert API Endpoints
description: Create endpoints `GET /{id}/versions` to list versions and `POST /{id}/versions/{versionId}/revert` to restore a previous version.
sprint_goal: Enhance script management with version history, comparison, and revert capabilities.
epic: Control Panel UI and API for Script Management
acceptance_criteria: GET returns version list; POST creates a new version from old content and makes it active; Operation is transactional and audited.
definition_of_done: Integration tests for both endpoints are passing.
testing_requirements: Integration tests.
business_value: Provides API support for the versioning UI features.

title: Frontend: Implement Version History Modal UI
description: Create a React modal that displays the list of historical versions, with controls for comparison and reverting.
sprint_goal: Enhance script management with version history, comparison, and revert capabilities.
epic: Control Panel UI and API for Script Management
acceptance_criteria: UI displays version list fetched from API; Includes checkboxes and 'Revert' button; Revert action shows confirmation.
definition_of_done: Component is tested; E2E flow is manually verified.
testing_requirements: Component tests and E2E verification.
business_value: Provides the user interface for browsing and managing script versions.

title: Backend: Implement Configurable Maximum Dataset Size Limit
description: Implement a check to fail jobs with datasets exceeding a configurable limit (default 256MB) to prevent OutOfMemory exceptions.
sprint_goal: Implement critical performance benchmarks and stability guardrails.
acceptance_criteria: Jobs with large datasets fail early; Limit is configurable in appsettings.json.
definition_of_done: Unit test for the size check logic is passing.
testing_requirements: Unit tests.
business_value: Prevents system instability caused by excessively large datasets.

title: QA: Create and Automate Performance Benchmark Test
description: Create an integration test that executes a transformation on a 10MB JSON file and fails if execution exceeds 10 seconds.
sprint_goal: Implement critical performance benchmarks and stability guardrails.
acceptance_criteria: Test case exists in the QA suite; Uses ~10MB JSON and ~200 statement script; Fails if execution > 10s.
definition_of_done: Test is integrated into a dedicated performance testing pipeline in CI/CD.
testing_requirements: Test must run on consistent hardware to provide reliable metrics.
business_value: Provides an automated regression check for the core performance requirement of the engine.

title: Backend/Frontend: Implement System-Wide Feature Flag
description: Implement a simple boolean feature flag from `appsettings.json` to enable/disable the entire Data Transformation feature set in the UI and API.
sprint_goal: Achieve full operational readiness and deliver remaining features.
acceptance_criteria: Setting flag to false hides all UI and disables all related API endpoints.
definition_of_done: E2E tests pass for both enabled and disabled states.
testing_requirements: E2E tests.
business_value: Reduces deployment risk by allowing the feature to be disabled without a redeployment.

title: Backend: Implement Prometheus /metrics Endpoint
description: Integrate the `prometheus-net` library into the ASP.NET Core application to expose the `/metrics` endpoint.
sprint_goal: Achieve full operational readiness and deliver remaining features.
acceptance_criteria: GET request to `/metrics` returns 200 OK with default .NET metrics.
definition_of_done: Integration test verifies the endpoint is active.
testing_requirements: Integration test.
business_value: Provides the foundation for operational monitoring.

title: Backend: Design and Implement JSON Schema Validator Service
description: Create a new service `IJsonSchemaValidator` that validates a `JsonNode` against a schema string, returning a structured result.
sprint_goal: Achieve full operational readiness and deliver remaining features.
acceptance_criteria: Service is injectable; correctly validates both valid and invalid objects; caches parsed schemas.
definition_of_done: Unit tests cover all validation scenarios.
testing_requirements: Unit tests.
business_value: Enables data contract enforcement on transformation outputs.

title: Frontend: Implement Conditional Performance Warning
description: In the report configuration UI, display an `Alert` component when a transformation script is selected.
sprint_goal: Achieve full operational readiness and deliver remaining features.
epic: Control Panel UI and API for Script Management
acceptance_criteria: Warning appears when script is selected; disappears when deselected; is present on load if script is already associated.
definition_of_done: Component test for conditional rendering is passing.
testing_requirements: Component test.
business_value: Manages administrator expectations regarding performance.

title: Documentation: Create Comprehensive Feature Documentation
description: Write a User Guide, a Technical API Reference for the script sandbox, and ensure the OpenAPI specification is complete and accurate.
sprint_goal: Achieve full operational readiness and deliver remaining features.
acceptance_criteria: User guide, API reference, and OpenAPI spec are complete, accurate, and peer-reviewed.
definition_of_done: All documents are peer-reviewed for accuracy and clarity.
testing_requirements: Peer review.
business_value: Empowers users and integrators to effectively use the new feature.
